summary: Add an extra damage perk in the one-handed skill tree. It increases all weapons\' damage.
descriptionHtml:
--------------Feature-----------------------------
     This mod adds an extra damage perk which was only available to NPCs in one-handed skill tree. 
     There are two versions of extra damage perk mod. One makes weapons do 3x damage (2x for two-handed). The other makes weapons do 2.5x damage (1.75x for two handed).

     I made this mod to roleplay as NPCs without leveling smithing and enchanting. With fully perked weapon skill and Extra Damage perk, one can achieve the same weapon damage as NPCs\'.

------------Installation----------------------------
Extract the *.esp file under the data folder.
author: ASSUMING CONTROL
